title: Fix CI ERR_REQUIRE_ESM - Migrate to ESM and Drop Node 18.x Support
description:
Migrate project from CommonJS to native ESM and update minimum Node version to 20.0.0 to fix CI test failures and establish modern foundations for initial release.

Implementation Checklist:
- Update package.json: Add "type": "module", engines "node": ">=20.0.0"
- Update tsconfig.json: "module": "NodeNext", "moduleResolution": "NodeNext"
- Update .github/workflows/quality.yml: Remove 18.x, keep [20.x, 22.x]
- Run full test suite locally on Node 20.x
- Fix any import statement issues (add .js extensions if needed)
- Update README.md with Node 20.x+ requirement
- Verify CI passes on both Node 20.x and 22.x
- Update CONTRIBUTING.md if it mentions Node version requirements

Decision Reference:
- Use ESM Migration + Drop Node 18.x Support approach (recorded 2025-10-02)
